name: DesertSounds
0:
”Alexa open desert sounds”
”Alexa ask desert sounds to play for 8 hours”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: desert sounds
des:
Transport your senses to the vast, serene landscapes of the desert, where soothing winds whisper through sand dunes, distant birds create a gentle symphony, and the sun's warm embrace creates a sense of calm. Whether you're looking to relax, focus, meditate, or simply escape the noise of everyday life, our app offers a curated collection of high-quality desert sounds that will help you find your oasis of peace wherever you are. Transform any space into a tranquil desert retreat and experience the therapeutic power of nature's melody.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Desert Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
